head.title: Rules on Pets At Long-Stay Hotels

hedline.hl1: Rules on Pets At Long-Stay Hotels

abstract.p: Letter by Jennifer M Colman, manager of Manhattan East Suite Hotels, clarifies company's policy on pets as stated in Dec 19 article on various amenities offered at hotels in New York City (S)

block.p: Thanks for including us in the article on long-stay hotels [''Your Home: Long-Stay Hotels Cater to Families,'' Dec. 19]. However, I would like to clarify the Manhattan East Suite Hotels policy on pets. While we welcome families and children of all ages, and have been host to family pets, accommodating pet requests is at the discretion of each hotel manager. We suggest checking with the individual hotel upon making the reservation to see if alternative arrangements may be necessary.
JENNIFER M. COLMAN Marketing Services Manager Manhattan East Suite Hotels
